rows.label: qev086703_MSG0001
rows.name: You all right, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm fine, but it was reckless of me to put you
in danger like that. We should have run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0003
rows.name: As your leader, I failed you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_JNK0010
rows.name: Mutiny

rows.label: qev086703_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that you are the leader now.

rows.label: qev086703_JNK0020
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev086703_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that at least you aren't bored anymore.

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh my gosh, shut up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm just happy to have the chance
to see this other side of Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0006
rows.name: Reckless or not, she did the right thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0007
rows.name:
Yeah, and I disobeyed a direct order.
So in a way we're ALL failures![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0008
rows.name: It'll take more than this to shake our faith in you, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0009
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0010
rows.name:
Still, what was that all about?
If you don't mind telling us, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0011
rows.name: That creature...it killed Danny and Boris.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0012
rows.name: Danny and Boris...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0013
rows.name: They used to be on your team, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0014
rows.name: Yes, until we lost them both because of my poor judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0015
rows.name: So that's who we were filling in for when we found Tatsu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0016
rows.name: Yes...and I'm incredibly grateful to all of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey, we should be the ones thanking you.
I'm just glad we could avenge them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0018
rows.name: Me too, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0019
rows.name:
But more than that, I'm proud we've grown
strong enough to win that fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0020
rows.name: Elma believe in team, that what make it strong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0020_2_m
rows.name:
That what give Tatsu strength to win.
...Oh, and friends, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0020_2_f
rows.name:
That what give Tatsu strength to win.
...Oh, and friends, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0021_m
rows.name: Team Tatsu only work because Elma is great leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0021_f
rows.name: Team Tatsu only work because Elma is great leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0022
rows.name: Thanks, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0023
rows.name: Team Elma, do you copy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0024
rows.name: This is BLADE HQ, come in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0025
rows.name: Elma here. What's up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0026
rows.name: An SOS, ma'am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0027
rows.name:
We have a Reclaimer team engaged in combat
over in Oblivia. They need help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0028
rows.name: Ganglion stragglers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0029
rows.name: No, ma'am. Hostile indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0030
rows.name: Understood. We're on our way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0031
rows.name: You all hear that? Let's hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086703_MSG0032
rows.name: Right![ST:wait ]
